description: This file defines custom global new and delete operators that utilize a custom memory allocation library (mlt_malloc and mlt_free) when the macro USE_SYSRES_MLT is enabled. It enhances memory management by tracking allocation site information via __builtin_return_address and optional file and line parameters.

methods.name: operator new (unsigned int size)
methods.description: Overrides global new operator to allocate memory using mlt_malloc when USE_SYSRES_MLT is enabled.

methods.name: operator new[](unsigned int size)
methods.description: Overrides global array new operator to allocate memory using mlt_malloc when USE_SYSRES_MLT is enabled.

methods.name: operator new (unsigned int size, const char *file, int line)
methods.description: Custom new operator that captures file and line info for memory tracking.

methods.name: operator new[](unsigned int size, const char *file, int line)
methods.description: Custom array new operator with file and line info.

methods.name: operator delete(void *p)
methods.description: Overrides global delete operator to free memory using mlt_free.

methods.name: operator delete(void *p, const char *file, int line)
methods.description: Delete operator accepting file and line info.

methods.name: operator delete[](void *p)
methods.description: Overrides global array delete operator to free memory.

methods.name: operator delete[](void *p, const char *file, int line)
methods.description: Array delete operator with file and line info.

methods.name: void operator delete(void * p,const char * file,int line)
void operator delete[](void * p,const char * file,int line)
void * operator new(unsigned int size,const char * file,int line)
void * operator new[](unsigned int size,const char * file,int line)

ctags.name: operator delete
ctags.pattern: /^void operator delete(void *p, const char *file, int line)$/

ctags.name: operator delete[]
ctags.pattern: /^void operator delete[](void *p, const char *file, int line)$/

ctags.name: operator new
ctags.pattern: /^void * operator new (unsigned int size, const char *file, int line)$/

ctags.name: operator new[]
ctags.pattern: /^void * operator new[](unsigned int size, const char *file, int line)$/
